backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing dating profiles, matches, chats, and permissions with full CRUD and visibility checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a navbar update to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file summaries describing app structure, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme tokens and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading PWA metadata, icons, pre-boot script, and React app.
frontend/public/entry-loader.js: Pre-boot script that disables service workers, clears caches, installs a boot watchdog, and handles global errors.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining metadata, icons, colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with bilingual messaging and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker in temporary disable mode that unregisters itself and skips all caching and fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, authentication state, profile setup flow, and page rendering based on user status and navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, navigation menu, language toggle, authentication controls, and footer around page content.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches fatal runtime errors and displays a reload prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Dropdown control allowing users to switch between English and Nepali via the i18n provider.
frontend/src/components/OfflineState.tsx: Displays an offline alert screen when the browser is not connected to the internet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and provider managing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Hook tracking browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for profiles, matches, likes/rejections, and messaging operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language persistence in localStorage and translation lookup.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines English translation strings for UI text, organized by feature sections.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark theme and UI layout tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Implements a chat UI that loads messages, displays them, and allows sending new messages to a match.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays swipe-style profile browsing with like/pass actions and handles loading states.
frontend/src/pages/InstallHelp.tsx: Shows installation instructions for Android and iOS along with benefits of installing the app.
frontend/src/pages/Matches.tsx: Lists user matches, shows loading and empty states, and allows selecting a match to open chat.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Provides a profile editing form that loads the caller’s data, manages local form state, and saves updates through a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Displays language settings, account info, and logout functionality using Internet Identity and i18n.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Renders the landing page with app features and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL/hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project status, architecture decisions, and known issues related to deployment, PWA behavior, and production build errors.
